FIELD.NAME: FINAL-MESSAGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: When true, indicates the last message in the stream.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of mnemonics in this message

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the first mnemonic.

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the nth mnemonic: valid mnemonic, or valid mnemonic with no data, or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, No data, 3: Invalid)

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.UNITS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Units associated with the value converted to engineering units for the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NUM-OF-SAMPLES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of data samples for the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.TIME-STAMP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time stamp for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.RAW-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.EU-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to Engineering Units if engineering units conversion is present for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.TEXT-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to a text string if text conversion is present for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.FLAGS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Flags native to the T&C component for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.LIMIT-ENABLE-DISABLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the limit checking state for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.RED-HIGH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Red High limit status for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.RED-LOW
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Red Low limit status for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.YELLOW-HIGH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Yellow High limit status for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.YELLOW-LOW
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Yellow Low limit status for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.STATIC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the static (stale) condition for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.QUALITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Quality for the mth data sample of the nth mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
